dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: Hmm... You strike me as someone who isn't afraid to get herhis hands dirty─and I don't mean that as a euphemism. Are you interested in a bit of good old-fashioned hard work?

dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: ...But perhaps I'm getting ahead of myself. I am Grigge, one of Sharlayan's gleaners. It is our role to procure materials, samples, knowledge─all you can imagine, and more.

dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: Naturally, 'twould be difficult for any one person to comb the world each time our countrymen ask something of us. Thus did we form a guildship, the better to share information and see the requests we receive to the hands of those best suited to fulfilling them.

dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: Some requests, for instance, are better assigned to those who demonstrate a certain degree of finesse and persistence...and the calluses upon your hands tell me that you are one such person.

dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: I understand that you may feel some trepidation, given the...er, somewhat lax selection process. As you like as not suspect, the Forum would never officially recognize a traveler from another nation as a gleaner.

dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: ...Unofficially, however, we're up to our necks in requests as of late, and they're coming in faster than ever before. We'll take any talent we can get─and pay good coin for it─so please, tell me you're interested!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may now undertake gleaner leves by speaking with Grigge.

dialogue.name: GRIGGE
dialogue.text: Sharlayan or no, we are in dire need of skilled help right now...

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of the Hand or the Land of level 80 or above.
